I'm unsure of what to do with this journal.  This was where I would come and write out my sexual fantasies and frustrations and things of that nature.  I'm no longer with my husband, and it was with him that I had all these frustrations.  I now have an amazing boyfriend, and really have no need to come here and vent or express any fantasies.  I'm very, very happy, sexually (and in all other aspects), so what is to become of this journal?  I do visit here time to time to peek in on some of the communities I've joined, but other than that I have no use for this journal.  I don't think anyone reads this, anyway.  

So, what to do?  Delete it?  Try to find some other use for it?  Or, just let it sit idle and use it just for communities?

Great thanks go to 
form64
for finishing this for me.

The Green Scarf
